testsuite.name: EmailComputerListener

testcase.name: EmailComputerListener should send an email if node is configured
EmailComputerListener should not send email if node is unconfigured
EmailComputerListener should send one email per email address in the node configurations
EmailComputerListener should only send one email if only one email is in the list
EmailComputerListener should not send any emails if it's the master going down (offlineCause == nil)
EmailComputerListener should send an online message if it went offline earlier
EmailComputerListener should expand a single environment variable
EmailComputerListener should return nil if environment variable does not exist
EmailComputerListener should expand a single environment variable with several emails in it
EmailComputerListener should expand several environment variables
EmailComputerListener should take a mix between environment variables and emails
EmailComputerListener should handle a non-existent environment variable in a string with several other entries
EmailComputerListener should handle several environment variables with several emails in each

testsuite.system-out: Could not find environment variable ENVVAR Could not find environment variable ENVVAR1
